dct_title_s: The Triangle tour of British Columbia : Jasper National Park, Mount Robson Park, Canadian Rockies, and the scenic seas of the north Pacific coast, Canadian National Railways ; Canadian National Steamships Tri-City Service, Vancouver-Victoria-Seattle
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights.; Includes "Mountain altitudes" chart and ill.; On verso: Routes of the Canadian National Steamships Pacific Coast service (Scale [approximately 1:1,450,000]).; Includes inset and text.; "5271. 10-19-'27."
43 x 76 centimeters and 21 x 33 centimeters, on sheet 44 x 77 centimeters
